page.title: 05THE HILLS FARM
page.content:
{ The Hills farm}is located along {Eudon Burnell}road. It is a big farm, where they grow crops and keep sheep.The Hills is quite an old building, built of brick. It has very big{sash windows}at the front. It has old fashioned{iron gutters}which are painted white. Mrs and Mr Mottershed live there with their two sons and their one daughter.They have another son but he is married.They have two {water pumps.}The Hills has lots of out buildings such as stables, barns and cowsheds.
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
